content: Project uses Next.js. Follow Next.js best practices: use Image component for images, Link for navigation, and follow routing conventions.
Project uses Tailwind CSS. Use utility classes for consistent design and follow mobile-first responsive design.
Project uses TypeScript. Follow TypeScript best practices: use proper typing, avoid any types, and maintain clean code.
Issue detected: 15 large files detected. Recommendation: Consider optimizing or splitting large files
